creator: jlawall@hotmail.com
text: In the function ssl_dyn_create_function, the second block of error handling code contains a call to apr_pool_destroy to release the pool created at the bginning of the function but the first block of error handling code does not.

Created attachment 28522
add missing call to apr_pool_destroy
creator: jlawall@hotmail.com

text: That error handling code cannot be hit because the pool allocation functions are configured to abort if out of memory. I have removed the code in r1361792
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
